Topping: 6 oz goat cheese or mozzarella cheese

directions.text: Place bread slices on a baking sheet, brush with olive oil and sprinkle on herbes de provence.
Cook for 13 mins at 375° then set aside.
Heat an iron skillet in the oven at 450°.
Throw in mushrooms, thyme, rosemary and olive oil and roast in the oven for 14 mins.
Season mushrooms with worcestershire, salt, pepper, and parsley.
Spread on cheese on bread and then top with mushrooms.
